name: Titanium.Network.BonjourService
summary: Describes a service on the network which is published by Bonjour.

events.name: publish
events.summary: Fired when the service has been published (or errored).

properties.name: success
properties.summary: Reports if the publish operation was successful

properties.name: source
properties.summary: the service whose publish operation was completed/errored.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: resolve
events.summary: Fired when the service has been resolved (or errored). If successful, the socket property should now be available.

properties.name: success
properties.summary: Reports if the resolve operation was successful

properties.name: source
properties.summary: the service whose resolve operation was completed/errored.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: stop
events.summary: Fired when a service's publish or resolution was stopped via stop

properties.name: success
properties.summary: Reports if the stop operation was successful

properties.name: source
properties.summary: the service whose publish or resolve operation was stopped.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

methods.name: publish
methods.summary: Asynchronously publish a Bonjour service to the network. Only works if isLocal is TRUE

parameters.name: socket
parameters.summary: a TCPSocket object to associate with the Bonjour service.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Asynchronous callback function to receive the result of the publish operation

methods.name: resolve
methods.summary: Asynchronously resolve a Bonjour service from the network. Must be done before attempting to access the service's socket information, if a remote service. You cannot resolve a locally published service.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.summary: the timeout for service resolution, in seconds. Optional, default is 120s.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Asynchronous callback function to receive the result of the resolve operation

methods.name: stop
methods.summary: Asynchronously halts a currently running attempt to publish or resolve a service.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Asynchronous callback function to receive the result of the stop operation

properties.name: isLocal
properties.summary: whether or not the service is local to the device

properties.name: socket
properties.summary: the TCPSocket object that is used to connect to the service
